name: Portfolio
body:
Hi everyone! I'm Vincent Scalia, and this is my personal portfolio. As a freelance digital artist, I enjoy exercising my creativity and learning to better my skills. I specialize in 3D character art, and in 2D traditional or digital concepts. I use Blender 3D as my main software platform. #Modeling ### Detailed stylized or realistic models from imagination or concepts ![Robot. copyright vincent scalia](http://i.stack.imgur.com/HJ7g9.jpg) ![Lamp. copyright vincent scalia](http://i.stack.imgur.com/2BGbh.png)

A wheel car. by VincentScalia on Sketchfab

#Texturing ###Hand-painted or procedural textures for models ![Bird. copyright vincent scalia](http://i.stack.imgur.com/vpOog.png) ![Crows head. copyright vincent scalia](http://i.stack.imgur.com/RTT6G.png http://i.stack.imgur.com/RTT6G.png) #Game Model Creation ###Efficient meshes, textures and animations for use with any game engine ![Alley. copyright vincent scalia](http://i.stack.imgur.com/b0liU.jpg) ![Dinosaurs. copyright vincent scalia](http://i.stack.imgur.com/BwJvn.png) ![Droid. copyright vincent scalia](http://i.stack.imgur.com/qCqoL.png) #Concept art ###2D traditional and digital media concept art. Fresh but strange ideas. ![Fleece dragon. copyright vincent scalia](http://i.stack.imgur.com/4OsJE.jpg) ![Spider. copy right vincent scalia](http://i.stack.imgur.com/mvMUu.jpg) ![Frost dragon. copyright vincent scalia](http://i.stack.imgur.com/m590r.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
